Verilog.zh_des: Z80开源硅片。目标是成为经典Z80的硅验证、引脚兼容的开源替代品。

Verilog.description: Z80 open-source silicon. Goal is to become a silicon proven, pin compatible, open-source replacement for classic Z80.
